extends ActionListeners

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws org.json.JSONException,
                        java.io.IOException

        Displays JFrame with everything added to it. Main running method.

        Parameters:
        args - default main method.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the latest XKCD JSON cannot be read.
        java.io.IOException - if the URL of the latest XKCD JSON is invalid.

      • panelRewrite

        public static void panelRewrite(int numReq)

        Reformats main panel and frame with new XKCD image from JSON.

        Parameters:
        numReq - the XKCD image number requested.

        Sizes frame around XKCD image.

        Parameters:

      • setupTitle

        private static void setupTitle(org.json.JSONObject json)

        Sets window title with currently displayed XKCD number.

        Parameters:
        json - the XKCD JSON to pull the displayed number from.
